entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
